name: Power Split
flavor_text: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

name: Wonder Room
flavor_text: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

name: Psyshock
flavor_text: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: Venoshock
flavor_text: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

name: Autotomize
flavor_text: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

name: Rage Powder
flavor_text: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.

name: Telekinesis
flavor_text: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

name: Magic Room
flavor_text: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.

name: Smack Down
flavor_text: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it’s hit.

name: Storm Throw
flavor_text: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Flame Burst
flavor_text: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

name: Sludge Wave
flavor_text: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.

name: Quiver Dance
flavor_text: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Heavy Slam
flavor_text: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Synchronoise
flavor_text: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

name: Electro Ball
flavor_text: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Soak
flavor_text: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to [[types:Water]].

name: Flame Charge
flavor_text: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

name: Coil
flavor_text: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

name: Low Sweep
flavor_text: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs, which lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Acid Spray
flavor_text: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Foul Play
flavor_text: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the damage it deals.

name: Simple Beam
flavor_text: The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to [[abilities:Simple]].

name: Entrainment
flavor_text: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

name: After You
flavor_text: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

name: Round
flavor_text: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round to increase the power of the attack.

name: Echoed Voice
flavor_text: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.

name: Chip Away
flavor_text: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: Clear Smog
flavor_text: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

name: Stored Power
flavor_text: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

name: Quick Guard
flavor_text: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

name: Ally Switch
flavor_text: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.

name: Scald
flavor_text: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Shell Smash
flavor_text: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: Heal Pulse
flavor_text: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Hex
flavor_text: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

name: Sky Drop
flavor_text: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

name: Shift Gear
flavor_text: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.

name: Circle Throw
flavor_text: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Incinerate
flavor_text: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

name: Quash
flavor_text: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

name: Acrobatics
flavor_text: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

name: Reflect Type
flavor_text: The user reflects the target’s type, making the user the same type as the target.

name: Retaliate
flavor_text: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power is increased.

name: Final Gambit
flavor_text: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

name: Bestow
flavor_text: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item.

name: Inferno
flavor_text: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

name: Water Pledge
flavor_text: A column of water hits the target. When used with [[moves:Fire Pledge|its fire equivalent]], its power increases and a rainbow appears.

name: Fire Pledge
flavor_text: A column of fire hits the target. When used with [[moves:Grass Pledge|its grass equivalent]], its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.

name: Grass Pledge
flavor_text: A column of grass hits the target. When used with [[moves:Water Pledge|its water equivalent]], its power increases and a vast swamp appears.

name: Volt Switch
flavor_text: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Struggle Bug
flavor_text: While resisting, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stats of those hit.

name: Bulldoze
flavor_text: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

name: Frost Breath
flavor_text: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Dragon Tail
flavor_text: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Work Up
flavor_text: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

name: Electroweb
flavor_text: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stats.

name: Wild Charge
flavor_text: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Drill Run
flavor_text: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Dual Chop
flavor_text: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Heart Stamp
flavor_text: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Horn Leech
flavor_text: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: Sacred Sword
flavor_text: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: Razor Shell
flavor_text: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Heat Crash
flavor_text: The user slams its target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Leaf Tornado
flavor_text: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Steamroller
flavor_text: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Cotton Guard
flavor_text: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user’s Defense stat.

name: Night Daze
flavor_text: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Psystrike
flavor_text: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: Tail Slap
flavor_text: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

name: Hurricane
flavor_text: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

name: Head Charge
flavor_text: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. This also damages the user a little.

name: Gear Grind
flavor_text: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.

name: Searing Shot
flavor_text: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

name: Techno Blast
flavor_text: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move’s type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

name: Relic Song
flavor_text: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

name: Secret Sword
flavor_text: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.

name: Glaciate
flavor_text: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stats.

name: Bolt Strike
flavor_text: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Blue Flare
flavor_text: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Fiery Dance
flavor_text: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Freeze Shock
flavor_text: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Ice Burn
flavor_text: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.

name: Snarl
flavor_text: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.

name: Icicle Crash
flavor_text: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: V-create
flavor_text: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Fusion Flare
flavor_text: The user brings down a giant flame. This move’s power is increased when influenced by an [[moves:Fusion Bolt|enormous lightning bolt]].

name: Fusion Bolt
flavor_text: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move’s power is increased when influenced by an [[moves:Fusion Flare|enormous flame]].

name: Flying Press
flavor_text: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is [[types:Fighting]] and [[types:Flying]] type simultaneously.

name: Mat Block
flavor_text: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

name: Belch
flavor_text: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

name: Rototiller
flavor_text: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of [[types:Grass]]-type Pokémon.

name: Sticky Web
flavor_text: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.

name: Fell Stinger
flavor_text: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

name: Phantom Force
flavor_text: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Trick-or-Treat
flavor_text: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds [[types:Ghost]] type to the target’s type.

name: Noble Roar
flavor_text: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Ion Deluge
flavor_text: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes [[types:Normal]]-type moves to [[types:Electric]]-type moves.

name: Parabolic Charge
flavor_text: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

name: Forest's Curse
flavor_text: The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target is now [[types:Grass]] type as well.

name: Petal Blizzard
flavor_text: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

name: Freeze-Dry
flavor_text: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on [[types:Water]] types.

name: Disarming Voice
flavor_text: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: Parting Shot
flavor_text: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

name: Topsy-Turvy
flavor_text: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

name: Draining Kiss
flavor_text: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: Crafty Shield
flavor_text: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

name: Flower Shield
flavor_text: The user raises the Defense stats of all [[types:Grass]]-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

name: Grassy Terrain
flavor_text: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up [[types:Grass]]-type moves.

name: Misty Terrain
flavor_text: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from [[types:Dragon]]-type moves for five turns.

name: Electrify
flavor_text: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes [[types:Electric]] type.

name: Play Rough
flavor_text: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: Fairy Wind
flavor_text: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

name: Moonblast
flavor_text: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Boomburst
flavor_text: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

name: Fairy Lock
flavor_text: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

name: King's Shield
flavor_text: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also lowers the Attack stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Play Nice
flavor_text: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Confide
flavor_text: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Diamond Storm
flavor_text: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the user’s Defense stat.

name: Steam Eruption
flavor_text: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Hyperspace Hole
flavor_text: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using a move such as [[moves:Protect]] or [[moves:Detect]].

name: Water Shuriken
flavor_text: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

name: Mystical Fire
flavor_text: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Spiky Shield
flavor_text: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Aromatic Mist
flavor_text: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

name: Eerie Impulse
flavor_text: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Venom Drench
flavor_text: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

name: Powder
flavor_text: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a [[types:Fire]]-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.

name: Geomancy
flavor_text: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

name: Magnetic Flux
flavor_text: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the [[abilities:Plus]] or [[abilities:Minus]] Ability.

name: Happy Hour
flavor_text: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

name: Electric Terrain
flavor_text: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up [[types:Electric]]-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

name: Dazzling Gleam
flavor_text: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

name: Celebrate
flavor_text: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

name: Hold Hands
flavor_text: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy.

name: Baby-Doll Eyes
flavor_text: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target’s Attack stat. This move always goes first.

name: Nuzzle
flavor_text: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: Hold Back
flavor_text: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Infestation
flavor_text: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time.

name: Power-Up Punch
flavor_text: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

name: Oblivion Wing
flavor_text: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: Thousand Arrows
flavor_text: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.

name: Thousand Waves
flavor_text: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those it hits can’t flee from battle.

name: Land's Wrath
flavor_text: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

name: Light of Ruin
flavor_text: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Origin Pulse
flavor_text: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

name: Precipice Blades
flavor_text: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

name: Dragon Ascent
flavor_text: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.

name: Hyperspace Fury
flavor_text: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like [[moves:Protect]] and [[moves:Detect]]. But the user’s Defense stat falls.

name: Shore Up
flavor_text: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

name: First Impression
flavor_text: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn each time the user enters battle.

name: Baneful Bunker
flavor_text: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: Spirit Shackle
flavor_text: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

name: Darkest Lariat
flavor_text: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: Sparkling Aria
flavor_text: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

name: Ice Hammer
flavor_text: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: Floral Healing
flavor_text: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the [[moves:Grassy Terrain|terrain is grass]].

name: High Horsepower
flavor_text: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

name: Strength Sap
flavor_text: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Solar Blade
flavor_text: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

name: Leafage
flavor_text: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

name: Spotlight
flavor_text: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

name: Toxic Thread
flavor_text: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target’s Speed stat.

name: Laser Focus
flavor_text: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

name: Gear Up
flavor_text: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the [[abilities:Plus]] or [[abilities:Minus]] Ability.

name: Throat Chop
flavor_text: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

name: Pollen Puff
flavor_text: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

name: Anchor Shot
flavor_text: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Psychic Terrain
flavor_text: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up [[types:Psychic]]-type moves for five turns.

name: Lunge
flavor_text: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Fire Lash
flavor_text: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Power Trip
flavor_text: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

name: Burn Up
flavor_text: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be [[types:Fire]] type.

name: Speed Swap
flavor_text: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: Smart Strike
flavor_text: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

name: Purify
flavor_text: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

name: Revelation Dance
flavor_text: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.

name: Core Enforcer
flavor_text: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

name: Trop Kick
flavor_text: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Instruct
flavor_text: The user instructs the target to use the target’s last move again.

name: Beak Blast
flavor_text: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.

name: Clanging Scales
flavor_text: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.

name: Dragon Hammer
flavor_text: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

name: Brutal Swing
flavor_text: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

name: Aurora Veil
flavor_text: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

name: Shell Trap
flavor_text: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on opposing Pokémon.

name: Fleur Cannon
flavor_text: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Psychic Fangs
flavor_text: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy [[noves:Light Screen]] and [[moves:Reflect]].

name: Stomping Tantrum
flavor_text: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

name: Shadow Bone
flavor_text: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Accelerock
flavor_text: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

name: Liquidation
flavor_text: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Prismatic Laser
flavor_text: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Spectral Thief
flavor_text: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

name: Sunsteel Strike
flavor_text: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Moongeist Beam
flavor_text: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: Tearful Look
flavor_text: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Zing Zap
flavor_text: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Nature's Madness
flavor_text: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.

name: Mind Blown
flavor_text: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

name: Plasma Fists
flavor_text: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

name: Photon Geyser
flavor_text: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.

name: Multi-Attack
flavor_text: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

name: Double Iron Bash
flavor_text: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Dynamax Cannon
flavor_text: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Snipe Shot
flavor_text: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: Jaw Lock
flavor_text: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

name: Stuff Cheeks
flavor_text: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.

name: No Retreat
flavor_text: This move raises all the user’s stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

name: Tar Shot
flavor_text: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target’s Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to [[types:Fire]]-type moves.

name: Magic Powder
flavor_text: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to [[types:Psychic]] type.

name: Dragon Darts
flavor_text: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

name: Teatime
flavor_text: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

name: Octolock
flavor_text: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target’s Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

name: Bolt Beak
flavor_text: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Fishious Rend
flavor_text: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Court Change
flavor_text: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

name: Clangorous Soul
flavor_text: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.

name: Body Press
flavor_text: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user’s Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.

name: Decorate
flavor_text: The user sharply raises the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

name: Drum Beating
flavor_text: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum’s roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Snap Trap
flavor_text: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

name: Pyro Ball
flavor_text: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Behemoth Blade
flavor_text: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Behemoth Bash
flavor_text: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: Aura Wheel
flavor_text: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move’s type changes depending on the user’s form.

name: Breaking Swipe
flavor_text: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: Branch Poke
flavor_text: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

name: Overdrive
flavor_text: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

name: Apple Acid
flavor_text: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Grav Apple
flavor_text: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Spirit Break
flavor_text: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Strange Steam
flavor_text: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

name: Life Dew
flavor_text: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

name: Obstruct
flavor_text: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker’s Defense stat.

name: False Surrender
flavor_text: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

name: Meteor Assault
flavor_text: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can’t move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

name: Eternabeam
flavor_text: This is Eternatus’s most powerful attack in its original form. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Steel Beam
flavor_text: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

name: Burning Jealousy
flavor_text: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

name: Coaching
flavor_text: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

name: Corrosive Gas
flavor_text: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.

name: Dual Wingbeat
flavor_text: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Expanding Force
flavor_text: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move's power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on [[moves:Psychic Terrain]].

name: Flip Turn
flavor_text: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Grassy Glide
flavor_text: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on [[moves:Grassy Terrain]].

name: Jungle Healing
flavor_text: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and healing any status conditions of itself and its ally Pokémon in battle.

name: Lash Out
flavor_text: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. If its stats were lowered during the turn, the power of this move is doubled.

name: Meteor Beam
flavor_text: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.

name: Misty Explosion
flavor_text: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is increased on [[moves:Misty Terrain]].

name: Poltergeist
flavor_text: The user attacks the target by controlling the target's item. The move fails if the target doesn't have an item.

name: Rising Voltage
flavor_text: The user attacks with electric voltage rising from the ground. This move's power doubles when the target is on [[moves:Electric Terrain]].

name: Scale Shot
flavor_text: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

name: Scorching Sands
flavor_text: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Shell Side Arm
flavor_text: This move inflicts physical or special damage, whichever will be more effective. This may also poison the target.

name: Skitter Smack
flavor_text: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Steel Roller
flavor_text: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

name: Surging Strikes
flavor_text: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Terrain Pulse
flavor_text: The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. This move's type and power changes depending on the terrain when it's used.

name: Triple Axel
flavor_text: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

name: Wicked Blow
flavor_text: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Eerie Spell
flavor_text: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also removes 3 PP from the target's last move.

name: Thunder Cage
flavor_text: The user traps the target in a cage of sparking electricity for four to five turns.

name: Dragon Energy
flavor_text: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

name: Freezing Glare
flavor_text: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

name: Thunderous Kick
flavor_text: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Fiery Wrath
flavor_text: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

name: Glacial Lance
flavor_text: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

name: Astral Barrage
flavor_text: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

name: Max Flare
flavor_text: This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

name: Max Flutterby
flavor_text: This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Max Lightning
flavor_text: This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns.

name: Max Strike
flavor_text: This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Speed stat.

name: Max Knuckle
flavor_text: This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Attack stats.

name: Max Phantasm
flavor_text: This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Defense stat.

name: Max Hailstorm
flavor_text: This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.

name: Max Ooze
flavor_text: This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Sp. Atk stats.

name: Max Geyser
flavor_text: This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.

name: Max Airstream
flavor_text: This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Speed stats.

name: Max Starfall
flavor_text: This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for five turns.

name: Max Wyrmwind
flavor_text: This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

name: Max Mindstorm
flavor_text: This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for five turns.

name: Max Rockfall
flavor_text: This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.

name: Max Quake
flavor_text: This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Sp. Def stats.

name: Max Darkness
flavor_text: This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: Max Overgrowth
flavor_text: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.

name: Max Steelspike
flavor_text: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon's Defense stats.

name: Max Guard
flavor_text: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: G-Max Vine Lash
flavor_text: A Grass-type attack that Gigantamax Venusaur use. This move continues to deal damage to opponents for four turns.

name: G-Max Wildifre
flavor_text: A Fire-type attack that Gigantamax Charizard use. This move continues to deal damage to opponents for four turns.

name: G-Max Cannonade
flavor_text: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Blastoise use. This move continues to deal damage to opponents for four turns.

name: G-Max Befuddle
flavor_text: A Bug-type attack that Gigantamax Butterfree use. This move inflicts the poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep status condition on opponents.

name: G-Max Volt Crash
flavor_text: An Electric-type attack that Gigantamax Pikachu use. This move paralyzes opponents.

name: G-Max Gold Rush
flavor_text: A Normal-type attack that Gigantamax Meowth use. This move confuses opponents and also earns extra money.

name: G-Max Chi Strike
flavor_text: A Fighting-type attack that Gigantamax Machamp use. This move raises the chance of critical hits.

name: G-Max Terror
flavor_text: A Ghost-type attack that Gigantamax Gengar use. This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadow to prevent them from escaping.

name: G-Max Foam Burst
flavor_text: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Kingler use. This move harshly lowers the Speed of opponents.

name: G-Max Resonance
flavor_text: An Ice-type attack that Gigantamax Lapras use. This move reduces the damage received for five turns.

name: G-Max Cuddle
flavor_text: A Normal-type attack that Gigantamax Eevee use. This move infatuates opponents.

name: G-Max Replenish
flavor_text: A Normal-type attack that Gigantamax Snorlax use. This move restores Berries that have been eaten.

name: G-Max Malodor
flavor_text: A Poison-type attack that Gigantamax Garbodor use. This move poisons opponents.

name: G-Max Meltdown
flavor_text: A Steel-type attack that Gigantamax Melmetal use. This move makes opponents incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

name: G-Max Drum Solo
flavor_text: A Grass-type attack that Gigantamax Rillaboom use. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: G-Max Fireball
flavor_text: A Fire-type attack that Gigantamax Cinderace use. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: G-Max Hydrosnipe
flavor_text: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Inteleon use. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

name: G-Max Wind Rage
flavor_text: A Flying-type attack that Gigantamax Corviknight use. This move removes the effects of moves like Reflect and Light Screen.

name: G-Max Gravitas
flavor_text: A Psychic-type attack that Gigantamax Orbeetle use. This move changes gravity for five turns.

name: G-Max Stonesurge
flavor_text: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Drednaw use. This move scatters sharp rocks around the field.

name: G-Max Volcalith
flavor_text: A Rock-type attack that Gigantamax Coalossal use. This move continues to deal damage to opponents for four turns.

name: G-Max Tartness
flavor_text: A Grass-type attack that Gigantamax Flapple use. This move reduces the opponents' evasiveness.

name: G-Max Sweetness
flavor_text: A Grass-type attack that Gigantamax Appletun use. This move heals the status conditions of allies.

name: G-Max Sandblast
flavor_text: A Ground-type attack that Gigantamax Sandaconda use. Opponents are trapped in a raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

name: G-Max Stun Shock
flavor_text: An Electric-type attack that Gigantamax Toxtricity use. This move poisons or paralyzes opponents.

name: G-Max Centiferno
flavor_text: A Fire-type attack that Gigantamax Centiskorch use. This move traps opponents in flames for four to five turns.

name: G-Max Smite
flavor_text: A Fairy-type attack that Gigantamax Hatterene use. This move confuses opponents.

name: G-Max Snooze
flavor_text: A Dark-type attack that Gigantamax Grimmsnarl use. The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the targets into falling asleep on the next turn.

name: G-Maze Finale
flavor_text: A Fairy-type attack that Gigantamax Alcremie use. This move heals the HP of allies.

name: G-Max Steelsurge
flavor_text: A Steel-type attack that Gigantamax Copperajah use. This move scatters sharp spikes around the field.

name: G-Max Depletion
flavor_text: A Dragon-type attack that Gigantamax Duraludon use. Reduces the PP of the last move used.

name: G-Max One Blow
flavor_text: A Dark-type attack that Gigantamax Urshifu use. This single-strike move can ignore Max Guard.

name: G-Max Rapid Flow
flavor_text: A Water-type attack that Gigantamax Urshifu use. This rapid-strike move can ignore Max Guard.
